title: DynamicCapabilityUpdatePayload (DCU_Payload)
description: Schema for the payload of a Dynamic Capability Update (DCU) message in ACNBP. Sent by a_prov_bound to a_req for long-lived bindings if capabilities or terms change. This payload is digitally signed.

messageId.description: Unique identifier for this DCU message.

bindingId.description: The ID of the existing binding this update pertains to.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the DCU was created.

providerAgentId.description: The ANS name or unique ID of the Provider Agent sending the update.

skillId.description: ID of the skill being updated.

capabilityUpdates.description: Details of the skills being updated.

newTerms.description: Updated terms (costs, QoS, PE) for the binding. Only include changed sections.

updateEffectiveFrom.description: Timestamp from which this update becomes effective.

requesterAcknowledgementRequired.description: Indicates if the requester needs to send an acknowledgement or re-acceptance.
